Package com.intuit.secfraud.shared.snot

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    SnotRag
    Generic Snot Exception handler for SlackClient that reads the response body to check for errors
    SnotRocket
    A wrapper class to hold JSONObject and target of Slack Message
    SnotService
    Snot Service to interact with Slack Client
    SnotTemplates
    Class to manage Tissue resources.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    SnotService.COLOR
    Color applied to SnotTemplates @see SnotTemplates and Tissue @see Tissue
    Tissue
    Predefined Slack Attachment templates
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SnotException
    Generalized Snot Runtime Exception
